name: Craft Core Warm Xc Pants - Youths
description:
Classic or skate, when an icy wind kicks up it can really kill the fun. These wicking pants have a windproof front with a soft brushed jersey at the back, protecting from harsh winter weather while maintaining breathability.Made of a stretchy recycled polyester with a soft brushed inner face.Ventair™ front panels are stretchy and totally windproof.Articulated knees promote freedom of movement.Ankle zippers for easy on/off.

        Sustainability
